item.title: How to Launch the Blog: Running, Configuration, and Deployment Guide
item.description: Learn how to start a blog from scratch with this step-by-step guide on running, configuring, and deploying Hugo blogging platform.

item.title: Welcome to My New Blog: Powered by Hugo and Styled with Congo
item.description: Explore the unique features of my blog powered by Hugo, the benefits of the Congo theme based on Tailwind CSS 3, and the versatility of Markdown functionalities, including Hugo’s shortcodes.
This article is written to test the common state.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m an Mphil student in HKUST(GZ) now, majoring in Artificial Intelligence.
